name: biomni-analyze-western-blot
title: Biomni: Analyze Western Blot
description: Analyzes western blot images for protein quantification
content:
Overview

Analyzes western blot images for protein quantification and expression analysis. Performs densitometry, normalization to loading controls, and statistical comparison of protein expression levels across experimental conditions.

Input Parameters

  • blot_image_path (required): Path to western blot image file
  • target_bands (required): List of target protein bands with molecular weights and positions
  • loading_control_band (required): Reference band information (e.g., beta-actin, GAPDH) for normalization
  • antibody_info (required): Antibody details including target protein, dilution, and expected molecular weight
  • output_dir (optional): Directory for analysis results (default: './results')

Input Format

{
  "blot_image_path": "/path/to/blot.tif",
  "target_bands": [{"protein": "p53", "mw": 53}],
  "loading_control_band": {"protein": "GAPDH", "mw": 37},
  "antibody_info": {"target": "p53", "dilution": "1:1000"},
  "output_dir": "./results"
}

Biological Use Case

Essential for validating drug target engagement, measuring protein expression changes in response to treatments, and assessing pathway modulation in pharmacological studies. Widely used in preclinical drug development for mechanism of action studies.

Output

Quantified protein expression data with normalized band intensities, fold changes, and statistical analysis saved to western_blot_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
